snippet.title: Boom Slingers - Be ready to cause chaos!
snippet.description:
Be ready to cause chaos!

Boom Slingers is a new explosive turn-based action game! Battle with other Slingers. Collect battle cards, characters and emotes. Fight your way up the seasonal leaderboards.

Unlock and upgrade over 40 different weapons and over 50 different Slingers. Battle in quick-to-play 1v1 battles in maps that change daily and participate in weekend events every weekend.

Collect cards, characters, gems and coins from the Boom Pass which changes every month!
